name: State agency expenditures for R&D for intramural performers, by state, department or agency, and source of funds: FY 2022
description: State agency expenditures for R&D for intramural performers, by state, department or agency, and source of funds: FY 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_state_and_department_or_agency_b
variableMeasured.description: State and department or agency hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_expenditures_for_intramural_performers
variableMeasured.description: R D Expenditures For Intramural Performers

variableMeasured.name: field_source_of_funds_own_state_government
variableMeasured.description: Source Of Funds Own State Government

variableMeasured.name: field_source_of_funds_other_nonfederal_governments

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Intramural performers include a department's or agency's own employees who perform R&D and services performed by others in support of an internal R&D project.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of State Government Research and Development, FY 2022.
